mention.text: the first thing the government did
those terrorist groups with whatever firmness and perseverance was called for

23 gangs of hired assassins operating in envigado in antioquia department , huican in boyaca department , puerto lopez and san martin in meta department , la rochela in santander department , and llanos del yari in caqueta department
puerto lopez and san martin in meta department
